column4: Tesla CEO says working exclusively with Panasonic for Model 3 battery
column5: SEOUL  June 8 Tesla Motors is working exclusively with Panasonic Corp to supply batteries for the Model 3  its first mass-market car  the U.S. automaker's chief executive said on Wednesday  sending Panasonic shares higher.

column4: Top U.S. auto regulator: Nimble rules needed for self-driving cars
column5: June 8 The top U.S. vehicle safety regulator said on Wednesday the government needs to be more nimble in designing rules for self-driving vehicles.

column4: BRIEF-Tesla's Musk says "Tesla is working exclusively with Panasonic for Model 3 cells"- tweet
column5: * Tesla's Musk says "Tesla is working exclusively with Panasonic for Model 3 cells"- tweet

column4: BRIEF-Funcom partners with NVIDIA on "Conan Exiles"
column5: * Has entered into partnership with NVIDIA for the co-marketing and development of "Conan Exiles"
